name: Super-Hero Piggy
description:
Super-Hero Piggy is an awesome arcade on your reaction!

Do you like muffins? Colelct as much as possible muffins an get title "Lord Of The Muffin"!

How to play: tap screen at the right moment to change piggy flight direction for dodging from aircrafts and collect muffins.

Super-Hero Piggy features:

★ Very fun and enjoyable game

★ Rhythm music and nice graphics

★ Suitable for players of all age

★ Tiny game size and run well

★ Compete with other players to gather more muffins

★ Unlock achievements

Make your super-hero piggy the coolest!

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/NinePointsGames
